game.name: USFIV: Complete Challengers 1 Pack (2011)
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, 다운로드 가능한 콘텐츠, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: All alternate costumes for Hakan, Makoto, Guy, Dudley and Dee Jay are included in this pack. Don your ultra rad gear and go to town on the opposition!
game.shortDescriptionEn: All alternate costumes for Hakan, Makoto, Guy, Dudley and Dee Jay are included in this pack. Don your ultra rad gear and go to town on the opposition!
